James Boyd collection of New York City etchings
Series I: New York City Etchings
Series I: New York City Etchings

Prints are arranged alphabetically by artist, then by Boyd inventory number within. (Boyd numbers) follow each title; titles listed are assigned by artist while [descriptions appear in brackets]. All prints are black and white etchings unless otherwise described; dates are given if inscribed by artist or in plate.
